title: Scenario where simulation would be beneficial

content.description: In which of the following scenarios is using a simulation more beneficial than performing a calculation?
content.question: Select two answers.

choices.label: Determining the average grade of the students in a certain class
Keeping track of the high score in a game
Investigating ways to reduce the amount of trash in the ocean
Studying the effect of a genetic change in a population

content.answer: Investigating ways to reduce the amount of trash in the ocean
